mapper.select: select sm.* from (select id, pid, title, icon, href, target, sort from sys_menu where `status` = 1 and (type = 1 or type = 2)) sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id = srm.menu_id left join sys_role_user sru on srm.role_id = sru.role_id where sru.user_id = #{userId} order by sm.sort

select sm.* from (select id, authority from sys_menu where authority is not null) sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id = srm.menu_id left join sys_role_user sru on srm.role_id = sru.role_id where sru.user_id = #{userId}
